name: THE BEAUTIFUL MOUNTAIN
description:
Somedays the NFT space feels so lonely and so overwhelming, Somedays I see so much art that is not like my art and I think to myself do I need to change to be successful? Do I need to change to fit in? 
The mountain feels so high, so impossible. 

But then I stop and look at the mountain itself, all the colours and painting strokes and digital merged together and I think how beautiful it is.

I remember how much I love making stuff and sharing my creations. 

And my energy returns.

This is a mountain I’m climbing. 

But it’s mine and I love it.



Personal daily art story
Number 13 #STOREEZ by Cat Brown/ Treasvre Trove
